revised_title: Mercury Poisoning and Its Effects on the Digestive System
tldr: A case study of a person who consumed crude mercury for treating constipation, leading to severe damage to the digestive system. The author describes the symptoms, autopsy findings, and the impact of mercury on the body. This study highlights the potential dangers of using mercury as a remedy and the importance of careful medical practice.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Pathology and Toxicology
